title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix everything together off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt and spices.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy toast topped with smashed avocado, olive oil, and chili flakes.
instructions: Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle chili flakes.
